title: How to Kill a Super Mutant Overlord in Fallout 3

steps.headline: Stock up on mines.
steps.description: Frag mines work best. Get a good collection of at least 20 before entering an area that may contain Super Mutant Overlords.

steps.headline: Bring along a precision gun.
steps.description: A rifle of any kind will suffice.

steps.headline: Travel to the area boasting the Super Mutant Overlord.
Locate the Super Mutant Overlord.
steps.description: Take aim with V.A.T.S. Lock onto the weapon the Overlord is carrying (generally a tri-beam laser rifle).

steps.headline: Fire.
steps.description: Get in two good shots, at least. This will break the gun in the Overlord's hands, rendering them defenseless.

steps.headline: Bring out your land mines.
steps.description: The Overlord will not flee like regular Mutants, but instead attack with its bare hands.

steps.headline: Sidestep its punches, then throw out a mine.
steps.description: Wait for it to plow into it, then perform the same maneuver again.

steps.headline: Keep laying mines until the Overlord is dead.

text: Stock up on mines. Frag mines work best. Get a good collection of at least 20 before entering an area that may contain Super Mutant Overlords. Bring along a precision gun. A rifle of any kind will suffice. Travel to the area boasting the Super Mutant Overlord. Save before entering. Locate the Super Mutant Overlord. Take aim with V.A.T.S. Lock onto the weapon the Overlord is carrying (generally a tri-beam laser rifle). Fire. Get in two good shots, at least. This will break the gun in the Overlord's hands, rendering them defenseless. Bring out your land mines. The Overlord will not flee like regular Mutants, but instead attack with its bare hands. Sidestep its punches, then throw out a mine. Wait for it to plow into it, then perform the same maneuver again. Keep laying mines until the Overlord is dead.
